name: src/brickLinkApiError.js
BrickLinkApiError
description:
An object that represents a BrickLInk API error
Catching this error can be used to access HTTPS status codes and error description

name: constructor
description: Create a BrickLink error exception object.

name: src/catalogItem/catalogItem.js
CatalogItem
description: Represents a Catalog Item.

name: constructor
description: Create a new instance of a Catalog Item

params.name: data
params.description: Data typically returned from an API response.

name: get

params.name: itemType
params.description: Catalog item type i.e. - MINIFIG, PART, SET, BOOK, GEAR, CATALOG, INSTRUCTION, UNSORTED_LOT, ORIGINAL_BOX

return.description: A request that is ready to execute with a client.

name: src/catalogItem/itemImage.js
ItemImage
description: Represents an image for a specific color of a catalog item.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of Item Image

params.name: data.thumbnail_url
params.description: The Url of the thumbnail image.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The type of catalog item as correspondeing to {@link ItemType}.

name: get
src/catalogItem/knownColor.js
KnownColor
description: Represents a known color object.

name: constructor
description: Create a new instance of a known color

params.name: data.quantity
params.description: The quantity of items with this known color.

name: get

return.description: A request that resolves to a list of {@link KnownColor}.

name: src/catalogItem/priceGuide.js
PriceDetail
description: Specific sale price details for a givent item.

name: constructor
description: Create a Price Detail instance.

params.name: data
params.description: Data returned from an API response.

name: PriceGuide
description: Represents a Price Guide for a catalog item.

name: constructor
description: Create a new instance of a price guide.

params.name: data
params.description: Data returned from an API response.

name: get

params.name: itemType
params.description: Catalog item type as found at {@link ItemType}.

return.description: A request that is ready to execute with a client.

name: PriceGuideOptions
description: Price guide option request params.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of Price Guide options.

params.name: data.color_id
params.description: The color Identification numbe of the item

params.name: data.guide_type
params.description: Indicates that which statistics to be provided. Options include "sold" and "stock"

params.name: data.new_or_used
params.description: Indicates the condition of items that are included in the statistics. Acceptable values are: "N": new item (default) and "U": used item

name: src/catalogItem/subsets.js
SubsetEntry
description: Represents a subset entry.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of a subset entry

params.name: data.color_id
params.description: The color id of the entry item.

params.name: data.quantity
params.description: The number of items in the subset entry.

params.name: data.extra_quantity
params.description: The number of extra items included in the subset.

params.name: data.is_alternate
params.description: Indicator that the item is an alternate.

name: Subset
description: Represents a subset item. A subset item can have more than one matching entry due to alternate parts.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of a subset item.

params.name: data
params.description: The response data from API request.

params.name: data.match_no
params.description: The number of matching entries or 0 if there is no matching of alternative item.

params.name: data.entries
params.description: The specific entries for the subset item.

name: get
SubsetOptions
description: Options that can be used when make a request for a subset.

name: constructor
description: Make an instance of SubsetOptions.

params.name: data.color_id
params.description: The color of the item(This value is valid only for {@link ItemType}.Part.

params.name: data.box
params.description: Indicates whether the set includes the original box

params.name: data.instruction
params.description: Indicates whether the set includes the original instruction

params.name: data.break_minifigs
params.description: Indicates whether the result breaks down minifigs as parts

params.name: data.break_subsets
params.description: Indicates whether the result breaks down sets in set

name: src/catalogItem/supersets.js
SupersetEntry
description: Represents entries of a superset item.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of a subset entry

params.name: data.quantity
params.description: The number of items in the subset entry.

params.name: data.appear_as
params.description: How the entry appears in the superset item.

name: Superset
description: Represents a super set entry.

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of a super set item.

params.name: data.color_id
params.description: The color id of the superset item.

name: get

return.description: A request that will return an array of {@link Superset} items.

name: SupersetOptions
description: Options that can be used when make a request for a subset.

name: constructor
description: Make an instance of SubsetOptions.

name: src/category/category.js
Category
description: Represents a Category

name: constructor
description: Create a new instance of a category

params.name: data.parent_id
params.description: The parent category id or 0 if root category. i.e. - 0

name: get

return.description: A request that resolves to a {@link Category} instance.

name: all

return.description: A request that resolves to an array of {@link Category}.

name: src/client.js
Client
description: Create a client to perform

name: constructor
description: Create an instance of the Bricklin Node Client.

params.name: options
params.description: Options that are used to create a new client.

params.name: options.endpoint
params.description: The url of the Bricklink API.

name: send
description: Performs a concurrent-safe bricklink request and the callback upon success.

return.description: The data that has been return from the API request and any callbacks.

name: dispatch
description: Performs a bricklink request and the callback upon success.

return.description: The data that has been return from the API request and any callbacks.

name: getCatalogItem
description: Get a catalog item by type and identification number.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

return.description: A promise that resolves to a catalog item.

name: getPriceGuide
description: Get the price guide for a given catalog item.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

params.name: params
params.description: Options for the price guide as outlined in {@link PriceGuideOptions}.

return.description: A promise that resolves to a price guide.

name: getKnownColors
description: Get known colors for a catalog item.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

return.description: A promise that resolves to a list of {@link KnownColor}.

name: getItemImage
description: Can get an image for a specific image color of a known catalog item.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

params.name: colorId
params.description: The color id of the item.

return.description: A promise that resolves to an Item Image.

name: getItemSubset
description: Gets a subset of a catalog item.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

params.name: params
params.description: Options for the price guide as outlined in {@link SubsetOptions}.

return.description: A promise that resolves to a  list of {@link Subset}.

name: getItemSuperset
description: Gets a superset of a catalog item.

params.name: itemType
params.description: An item type as can be foud at {@link ItemType}.

params.name: params
params.description: Options for the price guide as outlined in {@link SupersetOptions}.

return.description: A promise that resolves to a  list of {@link Superset}.

name: src/color/color.js
Color
description: Represents a color object

name: constructor
description: Create a new instance of a color

params.name: data.color_name
params.description: The color name. i.e. - Dark Gray

params.name: data.color_code
params.description: The HTML HEX associated to the color. i.e. - 6b5a5a

params.name: data.color_type
params.description: A group that the color belongs to. i.e. - Solid, Transparent, etc...

name: get

return.description: A request that resolves to a {@link Color} instance.

name: all

return.description: A request that resolves to an array of {@link Color}.

name: src/condition.js
Condition
description:
Static dictionary of common condition terms to improve code readability.

- `Condition.New`
- `Condition.Used`

name: src/index.js
src/itemType.js
ItemType
description: Static dictionary of common catalog item types to improve code readability.

name: src/logger.js
content:
import debug from 'debug';

export const logger = debug('bricklink-api');

name: src/oAuthHelper.js
OAuthHelper
description: A helper for OAuth 1.0 header information and signing keys.

name: constructor
description: Intialize the helper

name: sign
description: Sign the request with oath headers and sets the signature member of the OauthHelper instance.

name: src/request.js
BricklinkRequest
description: Creates a request to use with the client.

name: constructor
description: Create a new request.

params.name: method
params.description: The type of HTTP request to perform.

params.name: uri
params.description: The relative of full path uri of a request to perform. This should not include any query parameters.

params.name: params
params.description: Additional parameters to include with the request in either post body or query params.

params.name: callback
params.description: A callback function to perform after the request has been successfully performed.

name: RequestParams
description: Represents any query parameters to use with a request.

name: toQueryString
description: Convert params for the request to a query string.

name: toObject
description: Convert params for the request to a an object.

name: ./README.md
package.json
